thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A most relaxing stay
thread.title_full: A most relaxing stay - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 531gillm
title: A most relaxing stay
text: On arrival we were greeted by a very polite friendly member of the reception team. We had arrived very early and it was no trouble to take out bags. We enjoyed a day in London and coming back to the hotel we were given our room key and our bags had already been delivered to the room. We were impressed by the level of service in general in the hotel.
